title: Andina
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Catering, Fusion, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Upscale Peruvian fusion fine dining restaurant in the Pearl District serving small and large plates, Happy Hour menu. Has a separate vegan menu, as well as several marked vegan non-alcaholic drinks, and everything on the regular menu is also marked with vegan options as well. Reservation recommended. Bar open an hour later than the restaurant.
